name: Project Management Professional
description: PMI Project Management Professional credential is the most important industry-recognized certification for project managers. Globally recognized and demanded, the PMP demonstrates the experience, education and competency to lead and direct projects.

name: Professional Scrum Master
description: People who have passed PSM and achieved certification demonstrate an understanding of the Scrum framework. They exhibit a dedication to continued professional development and a high level of commitment to their field of practice.
